root_cause: Missing WHERE clause
resolution: Added WHERE org_slug = @org_slug

description: org_filter param not recognized in query_executor
root_cause: Wrong parameter name
resolution: Changed to org_slugs=[org_slug]

description: Missing defensive org validation in cost_alerts router
root_cause: No explicit check
resolution: Added if alert.org_slug != org_slug check

impact: Pipeline fails: procedure inserts to non-existent column
root_cause: Schema-procedure mismatch
resolution: Added org_slug column to schema + updated table

description: API key mismatch between Supabase and BigQuery
impact: Cost Analytics auth failure - shows error
root_cause: Re-sync path regenerated new keys instead of returning existing
resolution: Modified fast path to return existing active key instead of regenerating
notes: organizations.py:1084-1130 - check for existing key before generating new

description: Team Members page shows Unknown for owner
impact: Owner displays as ? avatar with Unknown name
root_cause: profiles.full_name is NULL + fallback to Unknown
resolution: Improved fallback: email username > email > Team Member

description: GenAI consolidate pipeline procedure.name required error
root_cause: Config uses flat procedure_name instead of nested procedure.name
resolution: Changed to nested procedure config structure

description: GCP focus_convert uses wrong template syntax
root_cause: Config used {date} instead of ${date}
resolution: Changed to ${start_date} and ${end_date}

impact: 404 when calling Azure FOCUS convert standalone
root_cause: File never created
resolution: Created focus_convert.yml based on AWS/OCI pattern

root_cause: Demo data uses 'provider' column but procedure expects 'x_genai_provider'
resolution: Added x_genai_provider x_ingestion_id x_ingestion_date columns to commitment/infrastructure tables
notes: Also need usage_date populated for all raw tables

root_cause: Procedure references v_effective_end_date but variable not declared
resolution: Fixed EXCEPTION handler to use COALESCE(p_end_date p_start_date)

description: Cloud raw tables missing pricing columns
root_cause: Demo data doesn't include price_list_price price_effective_price etc
resolution: Added missing columns via ALTER TABLE to all cloud raw tables
notes: GCP AWS Azure OCI tables all fixed

root_cause: Procedure filters by usage_date but column was NULL
resolution: Populated usage_date from usage_start_time via UPDATE
notes: Required for all cloud raw tables

root_cause: Demo data load script didn't include pricing data
resolution: Loaded 31 pricing records from existing CSV via JSONL transform

root_cause: Schema missing column
resolution: Added x_genai_provider column via ALTER TABLE

root_cause: Pipeline config exists but not registered
resolution: Added genai_payg_cost_only to pipelines.yml registry

description: cloud_costs query uses wrong x_source_system values
impact: Alert returns 0 records for cloud costs
root_cause: Query checks for 'gcp_billing' but actual value is 'cloud_gcp_billing_raw_daily'
resolution: Changed to LIKE 'cloud_%_billing_raw_daily' pattern

impact: OCI costs excluded from cloud alerts
root_cause: Query only checks GCP/AWS/Azure
resolution: Added oci_costs query template + OCI alert config + CostAlertScope.OCI

root_cause: Query checks 'gcp' but actual value is 'Google Cloud'
resolution: Changed to IN ('gcp' 'google cloud')

root_cause: Query checks 'aws' but actual may be 'Amazon Web Services'
resolution: Changed to IN ('aws' 'amazon web services')

root_cause: Query checks 'azure' 'microsoft' but actual is 'Microsoft Azure'
resolution: Added 'microsoft azure' to IN clause
